description:
A young man gets a dream job as producer for an entire unit of idols. There`s just one catch, though: they`re all in elementary school!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagami de mo Miru Koto ga Dekinai Jibun no Kaotte, Nani?
When Can`t You See Your Own Face in the Mirror?
鏡でも見ることができない自分の顔って, なに?
